Utterance: Ami khushi je tumi ajke eshechho. Aaj tumar kemon cholchhe?
Umm ami shudhu shongkhyo korchi, je last few months dhorei eito. Ami kichu bhalo hobar opay pai na. Ami akhono khub down feel korchi.

Ebar last week-e je tumi amar shathe kotha bolar por, job-e chot kheye felechho, job harayechho, toh tumi ei bhabe prochondo kichu korte ichhe korochho na, shob kichu korte ichhe korochho na, shudhu shute thakochho. Ei kemon ekta dhoroner inventory niye ami mone korlam, opekkha korechilam, tobe ami dekhlam je tumi khub severe depression-e acho. Tai mone hoy ajke amra ki korbo, jodi tumi mane tobe? Ami ekta therapy try korte chaitesi toh, jeta tomar depression-ke address korar jonno. Eta bole cognitive behavioral therapy. Jodi tomake ekbar shune thak,
Mone hoy naam shuntechi.

Ok. Ok. Ami tomar jonno ekta chhoto chhoto byapar kotha bole debo, dekhi jodi amra ei therapy-ti kaj korte pari tomar depression-ke theke uttejonar jonno. Ami mone kori ei depression tomayo khub beshi areas-e influence korche. Kaj-e jaoar, relationship-e jaoar, shob kichu. Shudhu abar depression-er upor focus kore achhi abar. Tarpor ami chhilam mone je, depression-e jodi tomay ki feeling hoy, jodi tomay ki mone hoy, tomar kotha, tomar feeling-gulo, et cetera. Tarpor etar kichu upkaran tomar jonno diye dite chai, mane ei shoptahike ghar-e niye jete paro, tomar depression-er bisoygulo, tomar bhabna, tomar feelings, et cetera niye kotha bolte. Opekkha kori tomar jonno shoptahik hobe. Ekhane kichu vabe vabe mone koro. Shudhu etai aajke amra kore jete pari
Ami kichu-o try korbo.

Theek. Theek. Eto shudhu tomar try korte ichhe-ta boro kichu part-e. Tomar ichhe to try korar oshukh-e cognitive behavioral therapy te karon tomake better hote ichhe kore ami khub boro bishesh kichu. Ami tomar jonno cognitive behavioral therapy nie kichu bolte chacchi, sometimes CBT bole, sudhu shorthand-e, eta individual-er situation niye kaj kore, jeta individual-er mone eshe jay, sheta kivabe tader feel korche, tarpor tara shei feeling-er jonno kivabe respond korche. Ok, toh chalo ekta udahoron nite chesta kori. Tumi amake bolo, last time tomake ki depressed lagechhilo.
Dekho shayad ei siddhanto tai sobujokale,
Ok. Ki chhilo kichu ekhane sokal-e?
Tumi jano, ami shudhu uthechhilam. Mone hocchhilo 10 ta belai chhilo kintu shudhu uthte parini.
Theek acho. Tomar mone shobcheye prothom mone keno ashlo?
Mone hocchhilo prothom e mone hocchhilo, tumi jano, keno uthte hobe? Amar jibon chhilo na. Amar kachhe khub kam bondhu ache na kichhu kaj ache na. Shudhu keno uthte hobe bela ta.
Tumi nijer barite kivabe bhabte chao?
Shamman jonno shomman bhalo lagche na. Amar mone hocchhe na ami kichhu mahatta rakhchi, bhalo lagchhe na. Ami khub kharaap lagchi, kharap
Oi bhabnay shudhu tumi ki korbe? Tumi uthe gele na ki uthe ghumi theko?
Ami uthe niyechhilam, ami ekhane elo porjonto, ok.
Amader mone hoy tomar uthe othar jonno abhinandan korbo, ajke elo tomar jonno ota boro kichu.
Thank you!
Apni shomoy bar kichu bhabe anurag korechen, akta bedoner obosthay?
Ha, besh beshir bhaag shomoy to tai bodlei e jeno amar bhaabona.
Tipikally apnar uttor sheta obosthaye bed-e thakte?

Bujhte parchi. Ha, ami to aralay achhi, tahole ki, ha, ami berote hobi na. Ar ami to mane, kichudin dore sofa-te boshe boshe mone mone bhabtei thakum na jeno tara amake pachhena, tarpor ami sudhu boshe thakum.
Eita bolun, Tommy, apni onak diner jonno depress thakle mne hoi?
Ha, mane accident ghotle er age, kichudiner jonno khub vabe. Amar cheler, meye-gulor sathe, khub somoy katse.
Ektu ektu bolben oi diner kichu kichu somoygulo nijerke mon bhore jibon chhilen accident er agey kono depressing bhabe.

Mane, praatte bed-e boshe achi, amar bachcha-gulor doura dourite, amake uthte besh irritate kore, kintu mane, tara eto koreo ami khub bhalobashi. Utthe chhobi banai ar boro boro breakfast kore. Jodi holiday hoy, tahole amra kichu anondo kora, park-e jai ar movie dekha jai ar kichu.
Apni takhan kemon bhabchilen? Ovabei janlen kivabe bhabchilen je ognishomoy jara obosthagulo ghotchhilo?
Ami sudhu bhalo bhabte parchhilam, kichu bhoy ney. Amar bachcha-gulor prem pae, ar ami tader prem kori. Ei rokom ektu priyo lagchhilo.
Eta to bhul chhilo na ki, aparne apnake proyojon chhilo ar apni bhalo bhabe anurodh korlen ar apni tader jiboner ekmatro hisse shobday bhaablen.
Ha, nishchit.
Tai kono somoy jabona, bed theke uthte na paoar e jotil obosthaye, ki mone hoi apni nijer upor kemon bhabe bhalo bhasha gachhen?
Ha. Ha, ami mone hoi oi rokom cheshta koreni. Ha, tai try korte pare.

Tai shomoy jabona, couch-e boshe thakar somoy, bed-e uthte parar moto mone hoi, apni mone korben je apnar jibon e aar je somoygulo chhilo, apni onno rokom e bhabe bhabte chhilen. Ar apni aro ekta obosthaye anondo peyechhilen.
Ha.
Tumi kamon lagchilo kaj kore? Kajer shomoy tumi nijer bishoye ki bhabei bodh korechilo?

Bhalo lagchilo amar factory te kaar parts banate. Amra shobai ekta kaj korechilam. Ami parts banachhilam, je gari'r rang debe, ar karo kaaj korar jonno tar thake bebohar hoto. Tai amar bhalo lagchilo je ami kichu korchi, ekta uddeshya ase bole mone hoto. Accident ghotle, ami ota harie fellam, ar tokhon theke amar jonno kichu upakarito bodle fellam.

Ami khushi je tomake abar kichu somoy mone pore je tomake kono uddeshyo ache, ar tomake bhalo lagchilo ar manush tume valore mone korechilo. Ar depression er shathe, ghum theke uthte ar bistar theke ber hoa onek kothin. Sokal theke thik porjonto pore fellam, beshirbhag lok bolbe, je tumi ki amar bhalo lagbe ar amar ghum theke uthte o ar bed theke ber hoa ektu somoy lagbe. Kintu depression er shomoy ektu kichu korte hobe, ebong tahole tumi bhalo lagbe. Ami janina, ei jonno je tumi ki kore ber hoa uchit.
Hm, ami mone kori. Tumi je bolecho seta mone hocche.
Ar kichu somoy jonno kichu fix kora jay jemon ki tomake kichu korte valo lagte pare, tumar jibone kichu karonkaron ki? Je kichu tomake ghum theke uthte uchit korar jonno worth lagte pare?
Ami bolte partam amar bou ar bachader shathe time katbo. Ami fishing bhalo lage. Hm, amar jonno shob somoy bhalo lagto.
Tumi last kobe fishing e gechhile?
Khub din age, accident er age.
Accident er por theke kintu tumi fishing e jete uthte eto recover korechho je tai kora jay?
Hm, mone hoy korte parbo.
Ok, shundor.
Hm.

Tai fishing er alaava onyo kono kriya naki manush er shathe kichu korte shob somoy ki ache? Ami bhulchhi tomake bou o bachader shathe shomoy katate kichu kichu somoy oshubidha hoye jachhe. Ok, fishing er baire anyo kichu kriya ki tomar jonno mone hocche? Tomake anando kore?
Ami amar dosto der sathe baari te jete thaki, ora shomoy kore bbq kore, football dekhe ba kotha barta kore. Hm, amra shobai ar shobai'r family. Tai amader ei kichu samay jonmojonmot.
Ektu plan kora jete pare, ya ekta get together korar jono oto lok tomake bou er sathe jodi na, tomake golpo korte jaegaye.

Hm, mone hocche parbo. Accident er por theke amar mone hoto kono prayash korechhi na, karon tumi jane amar nije ke khub kharap lagchhilo, tokhon orra cheshta korlo, kintu ami kichhu follow up korte parchhilam na.
Ok.
Ami mone korchi je ami shayad try korte ichchhuk na.

Ei ekta bhalo suggestion. Tumi keu keu nia kaj korte chaile shudhu nijei kono kaj korte paren, jemon ekta baje bajate, gaan shunte, vyaayam korte, cinema dekhte, ya kichhu onyo kono kaj je tumi anondo pao, jeta tomar jonno oboshonno na. Mane, macher kaj ta ekta bhalo upay, jeta tumi kichhu aar keu dorkar nei, kintu mone mone, jodi tomar sharir vyast thake, ami ekta onyo kaj bojhar chesta korchhi jeta tumi anondo paoar jonno korte chai.
Um, mane, kichhu korar somoy, ami shomoy ketechilam.
Ar seta tumi ke kemon bhabte?
Bhalo bhabte thaklam, kaj korar pore ami shomoye bhalo anubhuti korte thaklam. Jemon, vyaayam korte, nishchoy bhalo lagchhilo.

Ar tomar kichhu bhalo sujhav o ache je tumi ichchhuk hote pare. Tumi jekhane jeno tene nijer kichhu korte shuru koro, kichhu kaj er planning koro, eta bhalo lagbe. Jodi tomay shomoy hoy, tobe tomar shomoy er kichhu ekta kaj plan koro, karon tomar jonno etai kichhu anondo ar motamuti bhalo hote pare, eto jemon vyaayam korte, mach kete chole jete pare, ekta bondhuder sathe time spend korar plan korte pare. Okay. Tumi, Tom, next week er ei shikar ta ami chai, tomar jonno, tomar kono din er shikar ta tumi ei khat er upor lekha kore rakhte paro, tomar ei shikar er katha jot korte paro, mone rakhben, kono din egiye, jodi tomar ekdin bed e giye thake ar utha na thake, tobe tumi lekha kore rakhte paro tomar mone je automatic thought gulo tomar mone asche, bed e giye. Okay, Bed e giye theke uthar kono karon nei. Manush shobcheye beshi jotna er shabd ta use korechho, ja chhilo tomar automatic thought ta, tai lekha kore rakho, ar lekha kore rakho je eta tumi kemon bhabte thako.

Ekta somoy lagbe, tumar jonno bepar ta somoy niye patience rakha. Tumar jonno patience rakho, tumar jonno ar kauke patience rakho. Ami mone kori eta besho boro bhaag e, try korte raji howa. Process ta somoy niye nibe, ektu kore, ektu kore amra kotha bolte pari je ki kaj korchche, ar ki kaj korchche na, ar amra tai parbo. Kintu amra mone kori ei CBT valo kaj kore, tumi keno e bhabe mone hocche, keno e bhalo lagche, mone kori. Mone kori.
